Posts.Content: WorriedDaughter3 wrote: I am new -- and am being a worried/supportive daughter for my mom who was recently dx'd with Stage IIa breast cancer. She has an appt with her MO soon and I am a nervous wreck waiting to find out her OncoTest results.  There had been little/no mention of Chemo until now... and I am praying that it comes back low so she doesn't need to go through this.  She has had a partial mast and consult with radiologist so far, this will be the last piece of the puzzle to determine the best plan of attack!! Just needed to get my worries out!! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: MO appt - worried WorriedDaughter3 BioAdoptMom3
